components.label: Are students able to take this on a part time basis?
components.description:
A part time program has a course load between 20 and 59%.
A full time program must have course load of:
    • 60% or greater OR
    • Between 40 and 60% for students with a permanent disability

components.label: SABC program code, if this program has been approved for SABC funding before

How will this program be delivered? (Select all that apply)
Will the program also be offered and delivered at 100% course load on site?
Will the students earn the same number of credits int he same time period as students in other StudentAid BC eligible programs delivered on site
Will they earn academic credits that are recognized at another designated institution listed in the BC Transfer Guide or other acceptable articulation agreements from other jurisdictions
Years required to completed this program

components.html:
Admission requirements

All students must have either graduated from high school or equivalent or be 19 years of age or older for the program to be eligible. This requirement must apply to all students within a program, not only those applying for SABC funding
components.label: Content
What are the admission requirements for this program?

values.label: All students must have a minimum of high school diploma or equivalent
There is no minimum academic requirement

components.label: Is the minimum age 19 and up?

English as a Second Language (ESL) content

All students must have a minimum of high school diploma or equivalent
components.label: Content
What percentage of the program has ESL Content?
ESL Error
components.content: Error! This program is ineligible for StudentAid BC. ESL Cannot make up more than 20% of course content

components.html:
Program partnerships

If any portion of this program is offered at a partner institution, that institution must also be designated at SABC. Designated institutions are listed in the "Appy for a Loan" section of the SABC website
components.label: Content
Is the program offered jointly or in partnership with other institutions?
Are all institutions you partner with for this program designated by Student Aid BC?
Join Program Error
components.content: Error! This program is ineligible for Student Aid BC, All partner institutions must be designated by StudentAid BC
